TROUSERS FOR MEN

Every man, young or old, should have a pair of adidas trousers in his wardrobe. Part of the match day experience – whether you’re supporting, training or playing on the field – is choosing the best gear. adidas keeps everyone in mind when designing its collections, and trousers for men are no different. You can choose from athletic trousers and tracksuits designed with advanced sportswear technologies or opt for casual trousers that stay true to OG adidas designs. No matter where you go, we guarantee a pair of adidas trousers for men will always be 100% stylish and comfortable – an iconic staple for every man’s wardrobe.

ATHLETIC ESSENTIALS FOR ALL SPORTING SUPERSTARS

In a pair of athletic trousers for men you’ll always feel game ready, ready to ignite speed and passion at any moment. These trousers for men are designed for athletes with breathable, quick-drying materials engineered to keep you cool and dry. The slim fitting cut optimises movement and flexibility while you play, with ankle zippers giving you the freedom to rip them off at any moment in preparation to start the game.

CASUAL TROUSERS WITH STREETWEAR FLAIR

Keeping true to the spirit of their original designs, adidas trousers for men have quickly become an icon not just of sportswear but of streetwear too. These casual trousers feature the iconic 3-Stripes, as well as modern technologies to keep you comfortable in any setting. They have a slim cut and tapered leg, so you can show off your favourite adidas skate shoes or boots. Available in a wide variety of colourways, you can choose trousers in classic black or stand out in bright red, blue or even camo. These trousers for men are made with cosy materials that are all eco-friendly, so you’ll also be supporting the adidas sustainable product program, which aims to help save resources and decrease emissions.

Are you going for your daily run? Maybe you’re training for your next football game, playing golf with the guys, or even off to a yoga session. No matter the occasion, adidas has a pair of mens trousers especially suited to your sport of choice. Choose tracksuit bottoms or sweatpants in your favourite colour for your exercise and training, while casual pants are an excellent, comfortable choice for daily use. You’ll even find snow pants in the collection for those winter days when you want to go skiing.

EXTRAS, EXTRAS, EXTRAS

When choosing a pair of sports trousers, you want to ensure it suits the activity you’re undertaking. But most importantly, it’s essential to pick one that offers all the extras to make your training session more comfortable. Lightweight pants designed with breathable fabric such as Climalite will keep you going for hours and feeling light as a feather, while trousers with technologies such as Climacool will keep you fresh by guiding sweat away from your body. If you’re planning to exercise in the rain, a water-repellent pair of mens trousers will keep you dry, and if you need to carry a few essentials with you, don’t forget to choose a pair with pockets.

EXERCISE IN STYLE

With such a large range of mens trousers to choose from, you’re guaranteed to find the style just for you. Choose a pair of mens pants with a slim, modern fit that’s snug around the thighs and waist then tightens up at the ankles, a regular fit for a good balance between comfort and style, or a loose fit which allows plenty of room in the leg area. You can also choose the textile of your choice, with adidas mens trousers available in cotton, polyester and fleece, and if you want a summery pair of pants to fight the heat, choose one with a ¾ or ⅞ length.
